'use strict';

// MODULES //

var bench = require( '@stdlib/bench' );
var uniform = require( '@stdlib/random/base/uniform' ).factory;
var isnan{{C_TYPE_SUFFIX}} = require( '@stdlib/math/base/assert/is-nan{{C_TYPE_SUFFIX}}' );
var pow = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/pow' );
var {{TYPED_ARRAY_CTOR}} = require( '@stdlib/array/{{TYPED_ARRAY_DTYPE}}' );
var pkg = require( './../package.json' ).name;
var {{ALIAS}} = require( './../lib/main.js' );


// VARIABLES //

var rand = uniform( {{C_RAND_MIN}}, {{C_RAND_MAX}} );


// FUNCTIONS //

/**
* Creates a benchmark function.
*
* @private
* @param {PositiveInteger} len - array length
* @returns {Function} benchmark function
*/
function createBenchmark( len ) {
	var x;
	var y;
	var i;

	x = new {{TYPED_ARRAY_CTOR}}( len );
	y = new {{TYPED_ARRAY_CTOR}}( len );
	for ( i = 0; i < x.length; i++ ) {
		x[ i ] = rand();
	}
	return benchmark;

	/**
	* Benchmark function.
	*
	* @private
	* @param {Benchmark} b - benchmark instance
	*/
	function benchmark( b ) {
		var z;
		var i;

		b.tic();
		for ( i = 0; i < b.iterations; i++ ) {
			z = {{ALIAS}}( x.length, x, 1, y, 1 );
			if ( isnan{{C_TYPE_SUFFIX}}( z[ i%len ] ) ) {
				b.fail( 'should not return NaN' );
			}
		}
		b.toc();
		if ( isnan{{C_TYPE_SUFFIX}}( z[ i%len ] ) ) {
			b.fail( 'should not return NaN' );
		}
		b.pass( 'benchmark finished' );
		b.end();
	}
}


// MAIN //

/**
* Main execution sequence.
*
* @private
*/
function main() {
	var len;
	var min;
	var max;
	var f;
	var i;

	min = 1; // 10^min
	max = 6; // 10^max

	for ( i = min; i <= max; i++ ) {
		len = pow( 10, i );
		f = createBenchmark( len );
		bench( pkg+':len='+len, f );
	}
}

main();
